minced meat.

Sweating for a couple of minutes,

whisking and cooking

whisking into a smooth
paste after each addition.

This is gonna give us

Whisking constantly so that

Repeating three to four times

This will prevent the

Brush down with a beaten egg,

fridge for one hour,

Next up, twice cooked new potatoes.

cool, patting them dry,

Then I'm squirting them

flipping halfway through
